description: On the beach at Fire Island, Richie Fine and Chris Bolt talk about their goals for the week. Fine wants to hook up with Michael Lucas, who has recently jogged by. Bolt wants to find the biggest cock on the island. But they happily settle for a foursome with Mitch Ryder and Aaron Tanner. Humpy Bolt and tattooed blondie Tanner play bottom.
title: Chris Bolt, Aaron Tanner, Mitch Ryder, and Richie Fine
